website_summaries.verdict: This faucet is time-saving and water-saving, as when the pull-down nozzle is returned, it goes back into its "home" easily and automatically shuts the water off.
pros: Well-made, this faucet is easy to install
It features a manual override to have it work like a regular faucet
cons: The sensor is low, and you need to get close to activate it

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 2 days use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 2 days then the hot water just started to slowly lose pressure until it was almost a trickle. Customer service was good and offered to send a replacemnet cartridge, but I have no desire to start replacing parts on a brand new faucet. The filter on the control box also had a significant amount of plastic shavings in it. Had they offered to just send a replacement faucet with an advance RMA, I probably would have kept it, but not much faith in a unit that fails from the start pretty much.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Electronics Died
customer_reviews.text: Bought this faucet for the no-touch feature. That feature died after 6 months. When it quit, I was hoping that that was just the life of the battery operation, but no such luck. Still works from the handle until I can find time to replace the faucet. Two plumbers have schooled me to get a Moen next time.
customer_reviews.author: Engr

customer_reviews.title: This was so easy. I had no problem whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: I have never installed a faucet in my life. After I watched the video, I ordered it. And after analyzing this for too long, way too long in my opinion, I decided to just start putting this thing together. This was so easy. I had no problem whatsoever. However... what I had not anticipated was how hard it was going to be to remove my previous Faucet. That was a nightmare. Anyways, once that was removed and this new one was installed by me with no help from anyone, it worked beautifully. And it looks great. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: The eventual leak
customer_reviews.text: Well, i bought this because it was cheap. And I suppose you do get what you pay for, as i'll be replacing it in short order. I had no issues getting it installed, no issues with the sensor, and didn't have any leaks for roughly a year and a half. But recently the handle has started to leak. It's unfortunate, because i really liked the look and function of this faucet. The leaks are real, it might not happen right away, but it will eventually happen.
customer_reviews.author: B. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Color me impressed
customer_reviews.text: The faucet in my kitchen sink broke after 10 years and I had to replace it. I decided that the next faucet should be better than the one it is replacing. I wanted a motion-sensing model to promote good hygiene as the kitchen faucet is the one used most often in the house. Most were either super expensive or by brands I had never heard of. I was surprised to find this model from a well-known brand at reasonable priced. The product itself is really well-made. The metal parts seem solid and hefty in the hands and the connectors are high quality brass. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: SmithsonianGeek

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality. Installed it a couple of days ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Installed it a couple of days ago and bronze coating is coming off. For the amount of money paid would expect something better than this. Requested replacement and waiting on customer service to get back with me
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: Our last faucet began to leak so I went on the search for a replacement. My mind was blown when I realized they have automatic kitchen faucets. I didn't even know this was a thing, but I am so glad I found out! After researching a bit, I decided to give this one a try since the price was right and the reviews were positive. BEST. PURCHASE. EVER. I feel so fancy every time I use it. My husband installed this with ease. The batteries have lasted so far. The spray feature is great. The brushed nickel color is great. Overall I love everything about this faucet. I would highly recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Was Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: After pricing out motion sensored faucets I found this one which was much cheaper. As a hardlined 'you get what you pay for' gal, I was skeptical. Well, I've had it for several months now and this is a wonderful faucet. My handyman had no trouble installing it and it's been a dream ever since. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly as advertised. Good quality, easy to set up (took a couple of hours but was very straight forward with the clear instructions). The touchless feature is very cool and useful. Was a little surprised the battery drained in 3 months but not a big issue. we set it at the water speed and temperature we most often use and it saves so much water. For almost the same price as a normal faucet, this is a great luxurious addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sindhu

customer_reviews.title: Elegant HandsFree Faucet!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this Faucet. It has an elegant design and works very well. Especially like the auto on when pulling the spray head down for use, then auto off again when head back in place. Our Control Box actually failed after a few days, but Manufacturer quick shipped a replacement and it has worked flawlessly since. $100 cheaper than the Moen and better looking in our opinion. Win/Win.
customer_reviews.author: srbrew2

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Got this item 3 years ago. If you have installed stuff under a cabinet this should be ok. The only thing that I had to tape up was the battery pack... I have no complaints about it. It’s convenient to use, especially while cutting meat where you don’t have to touch the faucet at all. In these 3 years we only changed the battery once. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent faucet
customer_reviews.text: The space under my kitchen sink is very crowded...a challenge for sure. Having said that the actual installation of this faucet was a breeze. Clear instructions, nicely packaged and perfect fit. The motion activated on/off function works perfectly. Oh, our situation called for the one-hole installation; but I cannot imagine that the three-hole installation would be any more difficult. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to upgrade their kitchen sink set-up.
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy Strohl

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this faucet! I've had it installed for 4 months now using 4 rechargable AA batteries and it's showing no signs of slowing down. Super easy to install, easy to change batteries too when I need to someday. My kids love that they can grab the head and pull down for instant water spray that turns off when the head is replaced. I love being able to start water flowing without touching the handle when my hands are super gross. Looks awesome in my kitchen, bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Zbratt23

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great product
customer_reviews.text: This faucet has been installed for one month now - we love it. The hands free is great, saves water. Love being able to pull out the sprayer and the water comes on automatically, turns off automatically when retracted back to its base. Price changes on Amazon quite frequently: Stayed at 179 for a while, then 199, 249, now on a deal for 149. Overall I would buy it again and recommend it to anybody looking for this type of faucet.
customer_reviews.author: grecord

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed good at first but now that we have had it for a year it has a lot of problems. The sensor is in a really bad place, would have been better if it were off to the side. We are constantly turning it off on accident when rinsing large dishes. The last week it has started turning off right away when you wave your hand in front of it. The batteries seem to drain really fast which you can only tell because the sensor starts to act very weird. Overall go with a different product. This one has too many issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought this was the most needless purchase ever...until he was helping me cook and had dirty hands and could just wave his hand to turn on the sink instead of trying to move the handle with his forearm. I wish all sinks could have faucets like this. There is a bit of a quick learning curve as I found I kept turning it on and off by mistake while washing dishes, but you get the hang of it pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Lississippi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to install, but that was mostly due to the cramped area under the sink. Faucet looks nice and feels pretty solid. We love the handless operation of this faucet, and the option to pull the sprayer down to start the water. Also love the manual override they incorporate into the control box, if we ever lose power we can just turn the knob and use the faucet like a regular lever operated faucet.
customer_reviews.author: porterhouse_23

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, works great
customer_reviews.text: My youngest kids love this new faucet as they couldn't reach the handle on the last one. Removal of the old one was the hardest part of the install process as the mounting nut had fused to the faucet. I just installed it yesterday. After removal of the old one it took about 15-20 minutes. I will update this after a 6-month "family-of-7" abuse test. So far, so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Richard G

customer_reviews.title: I love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a little before leaving the review to get a chance to use it and so far, I love it. It was somewhat easy to install according to my husband and it works beautifully. The convenience of having a sensor is more than I ever anticipated. And the best part is that it is better priced than most nice faucets at the store that don't even have a sensor. Overall great deal, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Mostov

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: As someone in health care I've always been kind of revolted by the idea of turning on a faucet with my salmonella covered hands after handling chicken, washing my hands like a pro, and then touching that same faucet to turn off the water. Talk about cross-contamination. I installed two of these with my kitchen remodel a little over a year ago and they have performed flawlessly since then. I'm still on the original batteries I installed. The sensor works perfectly. They have a lovely bronze finish that's held up beautifully. And they were so reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: toy train lover

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you order from a BioBidet authorized dealer or your warranty is void
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks and function of this faucet. However, as you can see from the photograph we have had a problem with leaking from the handle. This water drip is damaging our new countertop, not to mention very annoying. The company will not honor the warranty unless you purchase from an authorized dealer, as you will notice there are only about two choices that are "authorized"
customer_reviews.author: M. Pyles

customer_reviews.title: Great proand great product
customer_reviews.text: Although I initially returned this, after remeasuring the sink fixture, I purchased this exactl faucet. It really works well. The on/off functionality with the pull out spigot is great! Installation was better than the Delta faucet I replaced with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, watch your setback clearance, motion sensor is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great faucet so far. The faucet seems well built and was packaged well. Install was easy and the motion sensor feature is awesome. One thing to be careful of is the space behind the faucet. The handle on this faucet is large so you need a good 2 inches of clearance behind it to get full hot water going. I ended up angling mine to get it to work which doesn't look the best but it works.
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN SLABAUGH

customer_reviews.title: Hot water line was defective
customer_reviews.text: Was excited when this arrived and couldnt wait to install. Installation was pretty simple, however, when I tested the hot water, it was only a trickle! so I switched the cold and hot water lines and came to find out it was the hot water line to the faucet itself that was defective. Packed it up and returned...it was purchased to replace an 11 year old glacier bay faucet...went to HD and got another glacier bay model with the motion sense feature, with led light, and had no issues...sorry biobidet...i had high hopes, but was ultimately disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Phagu

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this faucet. My old one does not compare to this at all. Love the motion detector feature, love the pulling down, love the look, just everything. My wonderful husband installed it himself and as everyone and their dogs mentioned, the tough part is getting the old one off. But once he did bam! The new one was on and working like a charm. I’m so glad we didn’t pay the price of another faucet to have someone come install it for us. Ridiculous price of install but that’s just me. You should buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Adam & MaKayla Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Makes your sink feels like a thousand bucks
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Motion sensor works great and your house guests will be impressed! Batteries for motion sensor have lasted a year now and it's still running. It looks expensive and feels like great quality. I'd buy again and it makes your kitchen sink feels like a thousand bucks
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it!
customer_reviews.text: What superlative can I say that hasn't already been said. This item works flawlessly! It was a breeze to install. The touchless feature is simply priceless and the price I managed to snag this item for only adds to my joy. It also adds a lot of pizzazz to our kitchen. Stop searching and get this! ~~~1 year Plus review~~~ 9/26/2019 Still going strong as of today. I've had a few battery changes but have had no issues with this item. I'm so glad I ignored the negative reviews on this and made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a year.
customer_reviews.text: Faucet handle lasted for about a year then began to leak.. Even if you turned it completely off, it still leaked. Also the motion sensor is very sensitive. Such as if a fly accidentally lands on the sensor the faucet turns on or if someone walks by it, it sometimes would trigger it to turn on. There is no way to fix this issue sense the sensor its built into the faucet. Unfortunately we were way past the return window and had to purchase a new kitchen faucet.
customer_reviews.author: MAXINES DINER

customer_reviews.title: 2 year life
customer_reviews.text: Purchased July 2017, Installed in new home in September. Worked Fine for 2 year, (with 1 battery replacement in 2 years). Suddenly sensor stopped working. faucet works fine in Bypass mode, and yes I have replaced batteries to confirm, twice. A $200 product should work more than 2 years, so am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hemanth Bhagawatula

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Kitchen Faucet!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to replace our kitchen faucet for a while but dreading the installation of a new one. This faucet is well made, functions exactly as advertised and was the easiest faucet I have installed. I didn't even need hoses from the shut off valve as the faucet connects directly the valves. The faucet can be used by the motion sensor or simply grabbing the spray head and pulling it out. Returning the heat to the faucet shuts the water off.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Maxey

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor has never failed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have in the kitchen. Installed a year ago, it has not failed me once! Very responsive to motion, yet not so sensitive as to activate when not necessary. It also shuts off after three minutes of operation, which is very helpful for when you are too busy in the kitchen. And it is really beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: anna tornello

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Faulty Design
customer_reviews.text: Faucet looks great but the handle to go between hot and cold water is awkward. The handle must be twisted & turned. Not convenient nor easy to do. Plus the product easily shows fingerprints and water spots. I would return if I could. Design is very poor. Faucet is beautiful and 5 year warranty is great. Loved my Delta Faucet better but it only lasted 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Great way to stop spreading germs --> Touchless technology!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet. The pull out function with adjustable weight works great! The touchless control is Amazing and I am so glad to have it! So even with dirty hands I don't have to touch the faucet and spread germs!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I made. My mom had her kitchen remodeled and wanted an easy to use faucet. The hose extends to a reasonable length (this makes bathing her Chihuahuas easier in the sink). The sensor works wonderfully and makes it a hands-free experience worth telling others. We have yet to experience any issues with it and are currently very content with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: V. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid quality... Really like its classy look... I still occasionally want to reach for the handle, I just have to remember to wave hand in front of sensor instead. I was cutting up a cooked chicken this weekend, my hands were all greasy, but instead of touching the handle, I turned on the on the water by waving my dirty hands in front of the sensor... Ha.. I have it set it up for warm water, medium pressure when it turns on. A great addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My plumber told me it's almost as good as the $800 delta's. The only thing I would change is to make it so the battery compartment can be mounted towards the front of the under sink area. But if batteries last awhile it won't be an issue. I love the faucet,especially with Covid. Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Install was easy and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Noticed this deal and have a BioBidet in the bathroom so I know the company. The Kitchen Faucet is easy to install. Took me about 30 minutes to take out the old and put the new one in. Instructions were easy to follow. Works just like they said it does. Turns on easy, spray is good, and overall am happy so far with the purchase. There are many others out there that are three times this price. Don's waste your money on those expensive ones. This one by BioBidet works just as good and its battery operated. Power goes out still works.
customer_reviews.author: okinawahall

customer_reviews.title: Best faucet for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this faucet for almost five months and we absolutely LOVE it! It gives our kitchen a high-end feel without the high-end price. We have yet to change the batteries, so even if we have to change them within the next month or so, that's still only twice a year so we're okay with that! The oil rubbed bronze is a beautiful finish and easy to clean. This was also very easy to install and took my husband and I no more than 30 minutes. Highly, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Perkins

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I needed this faucet as much as I did until we installed it! The motion sense is amazing. I love that you can adjust the flow and temp from the handle. The pull down spray hose is fabulous too as it just turns on once lowered! Hope the batteries last awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Mvalentine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent faucet, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice faucet. In my 63 years it is the first one I've spent that much on, but I don't regret it at all. Nicest one I've ever had. We did have an issue (it happens) and customer support went above and beyond in figuring out and getting us the part we needed to correct the issue. They WILL stand behind this faucet if you have any issues with it during the warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice after installation, but then the retraction of the nozzle into the neck of the spout stopped (see picture) so that it just hung loosely out at all times. Today the sensor stopped working all together, so we have a nonfunctional sink. Nice novelty idea but essentially throwing your money down the drain for a few months of fun.
customer_reviews.author: I enjoy sandwiches

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this faucet. We don't have to get gunk all over the handle to turn on the water when cooking. It even activates the spray when pulling it out of its housing as well as when swiping in front of the motion sensor. It's tall so you can fill large/tall pots easily. It's plastic so, hope it holds up for a long time - we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Radio Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear.....
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working properly after less than a month. Completely stopped working after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine H Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet Important Update
customer_reviews.text: 2017 I've really enjoyed. After 7 months it still works great. Update 2019 Thus far I had to replace 2 parts, the first part was the jet structure that creates the stream of water. The rubber components that stream the water were falling out. The company replaced the faucet head for me, no problems. Next in 2019 the handle starts falling off. When it falls off it makes a loud metallic sound that can make you jump. It appears the metal splits over time. Keep in mind, this is due to everyday pulling the lever to the front and the back. Im about to contact company, will update.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: You need to supply check valve with this faucet
customer_reviews.text: One thing they don't supply with this faucet is a set of check valves if you don't use them the water Will create A cross connection that means hot water will honor the cold throughout the house
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Beauty
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great faucet. It's very convenient to turn on and off without touching. Especially like the pull down feature. Watch out that there is enough space in back to toggle the faucet handle. We had to pivot ours a little off center to make room. Have not had it long enough for anything to go wrong yet. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: No impressed. Worked great for the first few months then the sensor started acting up then just stopped working all together.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Love the sensor faucet
customer_reviews.text: Received Bio Bidget FLOW motion sensor kitchen faucet yesterday and it was installed today. I bought it in brushed nickel and it looks and works great. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We've had it three months and can't imagine going back from touchless. The quality is good, it feels solid when you use the sprayer nozzle. It's great for preventing spreading germs too. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faucet functions well and for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this faucet. It wasn’t as expensive as some of the other brands but you cannot tell based on the quality. I have not had any issues and it works great. Very satisfied and it was an easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson A

customer_reviews.title: Love my faucet
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is awesome! The price was perfect, installation was easy, and I just love the sensor. It didn’t take long to install directions are simple and easy. And it looks amazing in the kitchen. I’m very happy with this purchase. And yes I would recommend this faucet. You can’t beat the prize on this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to but works well
customer_reviews.text: Faucet is well made. It takes a while to get used to it and it can be frustrating at times to use it when you're rinsing a large item and it keeps getting too close to the sensor, but overall I like it. It's fun. My son, however, doesn't like it at all. Also, it seems harder to adjust the water flow with the handle on the side rather than on top of the faucet. When we have guests, we revert to using the handle because they get frustrated by the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: plutolives

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and i love the fact the the motion sensor is not sensitive you actually have to get up on it for the flow to start and with kids and cats that’s a huge plus
customer_reviews.author: drea

customer_reviews.title: The product looks great in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great in the kitchen, however, the sensor only lasted for two weeks even with changing the new batterries.
customer_reviews.author: Thanh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works perfectly, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is a game changer. I love the no-touch sense, and the sleek design. It does not have as hard of a spray in the nozzle as my previous unit but this one is much nicer! Also very easy to install, even for me. Maybe took 20 minutes to remove the old faucet and install this one. Easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: RandomTexan

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen faucet ever expericened
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with sensor(IR & pull down) and manual mode. Beautiful and high quality metal finishing(mine is brushed nickel). (relatively) Easy to install. Covering for three hole also included. About durability is my only concern, but i don't care. No more satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Minsu Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love this faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. It works well and has yet to need the batteries changed. 4.3.20: I've had this for 14-months and I still love it. (Once in a while it magically turns itself on, but I've been near it, so I could have triggered it :) )
customer_reviews.author: R Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy
customer_reviews.text: We love the touchless feature. Perfect sensitivity. Very attractive and easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: cindy a kennel

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install! Classic look and feel. Works exactly as described. Fast shipping, packaged very well (the faucet was even inside a nice reusable bag that would be great for produce, storage, etc, which is a plus!). Cannot say enough great things about this faucet. Especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: jami anna

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and easy
customer_reviews.text: I love the Flow Motion Sensor kitchen faucet. I just wave my hand by the sensor to stop or start the water and if I want to use the shower head I just pull it out and the water automatically flows. It was economical and finish looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Lainy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Faucet was received packaged very well and seems to be made very well. Installed in about 45 minutes as nothing was needed that wasnt included. This includes removing old faucet and installing new one. Faucet also is able to be adjusted with simple turn of a knob to allow manual operation should you not want to use the sensor function.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love this fosset
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and installed fall 2017. I cook a lot and being able to rinse my hands or meat without touching the handle has been wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Schuble

customer_reviews.title: 19 moths later...
customer_reviews.text: 19 months later and the faucet handle is dripping water when in the ON position. Went to their website and there are no instructions on how to fix this issue. > If Bio Bidet sees this post please let me know I can fix this. If it's simply popping off the handle and changing a washer I can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet and price
customer_reviews.text: Great proce and faucet like it better than 300 dollar name brand we had that lasted only 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: IRC

customer_reviews.title: Love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful faucet that works well. It’s also much less expensive than a Moen or Delta. I’m so pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good quality works well
customer_reviews.text: Installation was no issue about like any faucet. I like the auto on off sensor. You do have to get relatively close to sensor but I like this so it does not go on and off while you are using faucet. I am pleased with quality. Just installed but happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy. I initially thought the faucet was broken
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. I initially thought the faucet was broken, because it did not shut off when I moved my hand away. You have to pass your hand or object in front of the faucet to open and close the flow. Have had it for about 3 months now and it is has help up well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: For Auto Mode, turn knob clockwise until it stops turning
customer_reviews.text: installation was a breeze but once you are all done then comes the instruction that tells you how to turn knob on sensor unit for manual operation but never references what to do for automatic operation. I had to chat with customer service for that. Turn the knob on the bottom of the unit clockwise until it will turn no more. That was the magic trick for me. Working like a charm once that was done. Great product, great price, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tetteh

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic in every way
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this faucet. My 3 year old granddaughter i is able to put her little ladder in front of the sink and wash her own hands and face. I love the on/off feature with the head. It took about 15 minutes to install by a 66 years old female and the garbage disposal directly in from of the water connections. The only problem is getting my husband to leave the handle in the on position.
customer_reviews.author: beachmom25

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet for the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic faucet for thd kitchen. Love the sensor and color of the unit. Install was simple and everything was included!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this faucet after returning another one I bough. This works perfect Its so cool being able to have water come on with a swish of your hand, the sensor is in the front so Its easy and a smarter set up. I love that you can all turn water on with pulling hose down. The other faucet had a side sensor and my water filter & dish soap blocked it so it was a pain.... I recommend this for anyone looking. Its great looking, works like it says and up-dates the kitchen without paying a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated in purchasing this faucet set given the fact it was not one of the well known brand name faucets. This unit turns out to be built better than the far more expensive faucet I removed. It was easy to install and functions flawlessly. It is easy to activate and the sensor is placed so as to avoid unwanted activation. We are very happy with it and would highly recommend this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: CMH65

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive with "Fantasy Brown" granite.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks wonderful. The garden tip will automatically turns on (without waving the sensor) if pulls out and shuts off once back in place. The only slight issue i have is the tip does not always go back in where the indentation position where the nudged-off location, but that could just be me not placing the weight in fully freed area.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Te

customer_reviews.title: No touch faucet!
customer_reviews.text: We are only a couple days in but I love, love, love this faucet. My husband installed this with ease. The no touch feature is great! I love that it’s not covered in grim all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy387

customer_reviews.title: Love our new motion sensor kitchen faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with our new kitchen faucet. We especially appreciate the motion sensor turn on/turn off feature. I installed the faucet myself; it was much easier to install due to the screw driven lock--no need for a basin wrench. Worked perfectly the first time. Only a minor issue. The temperature handle only goes back about two-thirds on hot because our window shelf ledge blocks the full range of the handle. We get slightly less than full water flow as a result. Not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Len Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet for the price point!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our purchase. It did take a bit to get the sensor to activate. One was operator error (putting in a battery upside down). After we got it to work we decided that we didn't use/like it as much as we thought we would, but the faucet is perfect! I couldn't touch anything of this quality at HD or Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: this is a good value vs similarly featured name-brand faucets
customer_reviews.text: Based on what you get for the price, this is a good value vs similarly featured name-brand faucets. However, once installation is finished, the manufacturer's lack of attention to a couple of design details become painfully clear. - Changing the required 4 AA batteries wouldn't seem like a big deal, but the first time contorting under the sink to align the poorly designed battery box, cable, and cover will make you question whether motion activation is worth the semi-regular effort. - The arm for adjusting flow and temperature is on the side and hits any backsplash, wall, or bar located close behind.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very great product. It works without fail. It was also easy to install. Very happy with purchase. Do not hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: curtis jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Faucet was easy to install, has solid feel to it, looks and works great with the sensor, having to be close to sensor to trigger it eliminates accidentally turning it on or off, good design, and best part is that my wife simply loves it.
customer_reviews.author: alewit

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It was all fun and games until the cat discovered that he could control the faucet. Now he stands there turning it on and off all day like an OCD crack addict. My water bill is through the roof, and I can't make him stop playing with it. I want to just go back to using a regular faucet, but I don't want the cat to think he won the fight.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Working great. It's automatically turns off if you use the ...
customer_reviews.text: Working great. It's automatically turns off if you use the spout(when it returns) which is a plus. It automatically turns off after a couple of minutes. If I'm doing a bunch of dishes I have to wave my hand it turns back on. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was worried reading reviews of it reversing the water in my other faucets but I didn't have any problems. Simple to use both hands free and with faucet. Also it has an auto shut off if the water is running too long on hands free.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product worth the money. If it has a drawback it's the length of the water "hose" Could be longer. I LOVE the on/off sensor.
customer_reviews.author: jimthetaxman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome faucet! Sensor needs some work
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this faucet for almost a year now and it's a great addition to my home. I've had to change the battery only once since owning it. It's a bit tricky showing my guests how to work the faucet. The sensor is almost a "touch sensor" as you have to be extremely close to it to active it. It's a good conversation starter, however, and for the price it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: C&M

customer_reviews.title: faucet works for the family
customer_reviews.text: good faucet. Just need to clean drips in front of the sensor and take it easy on cleaning the sensor. Still on the same batteries that is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jason y.

customer_reviews.title: NOT touchless
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 3 months and it DOES NOT work. The snap under the sink has come detached two times and has left my kitchen in a POOL of water. You also literally need to touch the "Touchless" sensor to get it to turn on and off. SUCH A WASTE! Now I cannot return it, need to buy another product, AND need to hire someone to install again. AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Few problems but product okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought this faucet and love it! Sensor works great, installation was easy after the correct pieces were sent to us. Price was right!
customer_reviews.author: A Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not what we ordered
customer_reviews.text: Very nice faucet. We love it, BUT what arrived was the chrome version (priced $30 less than the brushed nickel version we ordered). Since we already had the plumber on site, we had him install the one we were delivered. To reschedule would have cost more than the $30. It looks nice, we don't feel abused necessarily BUT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James W. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet for Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We love our new faucet in the kitchen, had no problems installing it. and it works great SO HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Clark

customer_reviews.title: Hoses too short
customer_reviews.text: Hoses too short for my valves. If you have water valves that are close to the base this may not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Weebs

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard: Turn itself on without anyone in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Safety hazard: Turn itself on without anyone in the kitchen. It happens once or twice every month. I have to manually turn off the faucet when leave home to avoid potential flood when no one is home.
customer_reviews.author: ChloeKris

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from needing an extension for my hot water supply (my fault for not looking before getting started) the install was very easy. So far we have loved the touchless feature and used pretty much nonstop since I put it in last week. I'm sure this will evolve into one of those, "How did we ever get by without this?!?"
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Priebe

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Appearance
customer_reviews.text: As the faucet has not been installed yet, I will reserve the right to edit. Looks good and it was shipped and received in days.
customer_reviews.author: MtSiView

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best faucet ever! Love the motion detector and automatic spray hose! The best faucet we’ve ever had! WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Young

customer_reviews.title: You will be waving your hands at every faucet you see wondering why not all faucets can do this!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and it totally spoils you with the no hands convenience. I cannot believe how long the batteries last. Thought for sure I would be going under the sink every few months to change batteries, but the set of eneloop I put in there will last over a year and more!
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: The hands free feature is the main reason I chose this faucet, and it has not disappointed. In fact, it works almost TOO well at times. If your hands passes back across the sensor as you turn the water on, it will sometimes turn it right back off. A minor annoyance at best. The installation was smooth, the directions were easy to follow, and it looks great. Wish I had purchased it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from sprayer after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first!! Must admit that I was apparently the only one in the house who didn’t forget to NOT turn off the faucet by the manual handle. Aggravating, but that’s not why I rated it low. I rated it low because after only 4 months of pulling on the sprayer, the sprayer is leaking from a manufactured connection. Not anything I can fix. Warranty expired after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time having a motion faucet and it works great! I love it. You can leave it on the temp and pressure you like. I have used friends that turn on when a cup is under the faucet, I found with this you need to wave your cup/dish/hand a bit closer to the sensor but it didn't bother me at all. Overall very happy and I would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Convenient compared to other automatic faucets
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this after living in my parents house who also have an automatic faucet, but works a bit differently. I like this because it’s wave sensor on and wave off vs my parents’ which is when you wave your hand st the sensor it turns on but turns off right away. You can adjust the temp right at the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Suleman

customer_reviews.title: Faucet leaks at handle after 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: This faucet has been used for 1 year and now leaks at the faucet handle. Very difficult to get the faucet to be at a comfortable use water temp. Either too hot or too cold without constantly having to readjust handle to find the water temp sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: LJK

product_meta.title: FLOW Motion Sensor Kitchen Faucet | Original Touchless Design | Oil-Rubbed Bronze | Dual Spray Head | Easy DIY Install | Battery Powered | Bio Bidet
feature_bullets: HANDS FREE MOTION SENSOR - The Flow faucet allows hands free multi-tasking for a more hygienic kitchen solution

NO HARDWIRING REQUIRED - Flow operates wonderfully and beautifully, battery operated, Skip the expensive and complicated hardwiring, and choose FLOW; The Flow faucet requires no electricity through complicated hardwiring and instead uses AA-batteries
SmartLatch RETRACTION - Fluid and quiet retraction of the braided black nylon hose automatically docks the spray head back into place
MULTI SPRAY FAUCET HEAD - Switch between two spray modes with a tap of button, conveniently located on the spray head
FINISH STAYS POLISHED - Simply swipe your hand near the infrared motion detecting eye to activate FLOW with no more messy finger prints

specifications.Item model number: BioBidet Flow Motion Sensor Kitchen Fauc
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars69 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
